columns.name: arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the export.

columns.name: export_status
columns.description: Export can be in one of the following states: IN_PROGRESS, COMPLETED, or FAILED.

columns.name: billed_size_bytes
columns.description: The billable size of the table export.

columns.name: client_token
columns.description: The client token that was provided for the export task. A client token makes calls to ExportTableToPointInTimeInput idempotent, meaning that multiple identical calls have the same effect as one single call.

columns.name: end_time
columns.description: The time at which the export task completed.

columns.name: export_format
columns.description: The format of the exported data. Valid values for ExportFormat are DYNAMODB_JSON or ION.

columns.name: export_manifest
columns.description: The name of the manifest file for the export task.

columns.name: export_time
columns.description: Point in time from which table data was exported.

columns.name: failure_code
columns.description: Status code for the result of the failed export.

columns.name: s3_bucket
columns.description: The name of the Amazon S3 bucket containing the export.

columns.name: s3_bucket_owner
columns.description: The ID of the Amazon Web Services account that owns the bucket containing the export.

columns.name: s3_prefix
columns.description: The Amazon S3 bucket prefix used as the file name and path of the exported snapshot.

columns.name: s3_sse_algorithm
columns.description: Type of encryption used on the bucket where export data is stored.

columns.name: s3_sse_kms_key_id
columns.description: The ID of the KMS managed key used to encrypt the S3 bucket where export data is stored (if applicable).

columns.name: start_time
columns.description: The time at which the export task began.

columns.name: table_arn
columns.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the table that was exported.

columns.name: table_id
columns.description: Unique ID of the table that was exported.
